content.detailedDescription: Early in the evening (7:15 p.M.)of last saturday, march 3,2007, my family and i were watching the lunar eclipse when i saw a bright big light coming from the center of the island moving on a southeast direction.  all of us saw the light (we were 5). the light was too high to be an helicopter and too low to be a satelite.  the most strange thing was that it did not had any strobe light and that suddenly it disapeared from our sight.
content.summary: Big light

content.detailedDescription: It was the night before thanksgiving 1989, i was driving on the main highway that connects los angeles to las vegas.  years before i had aquired a habit of looking at the stars in the sky overall and to look for what i called lights that would not move with the star patterns and this identified them as object based lights.  los vegas was approximately 20 miles or so away.  the light was on the left of the highway and you could see the road leading up to a small tower type affair.  the light was approximately 1000 to 500 feet above the ground.  i spotted it about 10 miles out before i came to the source.  the light was above the mountains.  the odd thing here was that it was the day before thanksgiving late in the evening.  the light was near a tower and very bright like a star. the oddest thing was that there were about  2 dozen or so new suvs parked on the road at the base of the tower.  this has bothered me for quite awhile. i stopped the car looked at what i saw and then drove off.
content.summary: Hovering light (above the neighboring mountains) with dozens of suvs at the base on thanksgiving eve

content.detailedDescription: I had just made a right hand turn onto cactus blvd. from 32nd street heading due east around 2pm.  out of the corner of my left eye something caught my attention, probably because it was hanging in the air above a large building (say, something like a wal-mart size wise). i was driving against a median so i glanced up quickly and saw this huge craft (i guess it was several hundred feet long and was suspended mid-air at about five hundred feet).  i was blown away.  the object didn't make me feel anything but awe.  it was beautiful. it was, what i would call, the perfect machine.  the funny thing is, is i only had seconds to look at it (since i was trying to avoid getting in an accident, and i couldn't pull over), but i had two clear unimpeded views of it.  it was made of some kind of black metal(?), it was missile like yet the back of the craft had almost an octagon shape with four (i don't know what to call them) arms that pointed to the very front tip of the craft--the tip of the craft and these four arms had, what looked like, pure gold orbs.  even though i saw this craft for only seconds, i knew that the gold orbs had something to do with its power source--don't ask me why, i just knew, most likely because all of these were in perfect alignment. on my second look at the craft, i noticed it had kind of an organic quality about it--that it was somehow alive.  well, it was.  i had to look back to the road and my driving, and when i looked back the craft was gone.  i believe what i interpreted as "organic" was actually it's cloaking device which, i believe, had failed and that's why i saw it.  this craft had about fifty, what i believe were, portholes or windows as well.  when i looked back and it was gone my first thought was to pull over and try to throw something at it--silly, but true.  i knew that it was still there.  child-like thoughts can overwhelm a person at a time like this.  anyway, that's what i saw, in my right mind, and in broad daylight.  years earlier, i had a physical experience at this sight, well near it anyway.  i believe that this sight holds a huge energy source of some kind.
content.summary: Ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: It was outside my home in the sky, so i got my camera and took a photo. this is not a joke i see them all the time and i take photos of them. i would love to show you the photos but im not very good on a computer and dont know how to send them.
content.summary: I see them all the time and i take photos of them. i see them but other people cant. i dont know why.

content.detailedDescription: I am a 54 year old father of six, my wife is a teacher and we live in evansville, indiana and i had to travel to montoe city, indiana (appx. 60 miles north of evansville and 15 miles west of vincennes, indiana and 3 miles west of lucky point)i had to show come cleaning equipment to a new church at 6:00 p.M. that lasted appx 45 minutes and after getting loaded up and back on the road was probably 7:05...I headed out of town and took 241 south...At appx. 7:15 i noticed a bright light to the west of me as i traveled south. i wasn't thinking to much about it because this type of light so many times before just turned out to be a plane...But in no time i could tell this was different. so, i kept focused. what made this different was it appeared to disappear as if it went into a cloud and then would reappear a distance later. did this several times and then i realized this was one of those nights that didnn't have a cloud in sight...Then it appeared to be gone (appx 20 seconds) and then it reappeared this time directly in front of me...The light was quite large now and especially for the distance it was away (unlike the lights on the larger planes or jets). what happened next was the part that was spectacular...First of all it appeared abruptly in the sky in front of me as quick as it appeared it then bolted out another light like a shooting star and then in like manner did this again... it was "bright light"-flash-"bright light"-flash-bright light...Then the three lights stayed lit for appx.5 seconds and then the lights went out(the lights flashed toward the 8:00 hour not straight out...This wss also the unusual thing about this experience. very bright and very large...And at no time did i see any of the typical green and red flaching lights associated with conventional aircraft...I took a few minutes to think about it and had to talk to someone, so i called my wife...Couldn't get it out of my mind so  3 days later i went to google and typed in "ufo sightings indiana" only to find out that i wasn't alone and that indiana was a hot spot and that the hottest spot was only 2 to 4 miles west of my sighting and in reality that was the direction it was heading...By the way the lights were white but the lightning type bolts or flashing like a shooting star as the other lights protruded were fire like in appearance...I wanted to report this for the same reasons i needed to tell someone...And for the same reason i researched google...I was blown away...And only wish family members or a friend or for that matter anyone could have been with me to have seen and shared this experience...In short no one else was, so this is all i can do...Is report it...And just this weak in yahoo news the ex prime minister of canada came to the fore-front asking the nations of the world to release ufo technology to help save the planet...Maybe it will be sooner then later i and others will get our answers...Thanks for letting me tell my lenghty story and bend your ears...Thomas rennels
content.summary: Phenomenal light show (definitly not an identifiable object)

content.detailedDescription: As i waited for my girlfriend to call, i looked out the window of my second story bedroom. as i scanned the clear sky, a very bright light shone to the east. at first i thought it was just a star, but its brightness and the fact that it was moving definitely ended that notion. the fact that the lights didnt blink often, and that it was moving so fast and in an upwards direction made me so sure it was something that wasnt ours. as i stared at it, it went in a up and left motion, until it went behind a tree. as i continued to watch for it to emerge, i was disappointed and startled, as it never came out from behind the tree. this is not the first time that i have seen this in my area, not only have i seen this before, but so has my father and grandfather, all just like this, my grandfather even saw one land up in the hills.
content.summary: Large star-like object rises straight up and disappears behind tree.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:12 pm, i was in my den watching t.V. at a medium volume accompanied by my girlfriend. it was around that approximate time that i was drawn outside by a very deep, loud, hum. as best as i can descride the noise it was as loud as a train but less rumbling, like continuous rolling thunder only no crackling. the sound was consistent for a few minutes and so strange to me that i walked outside. i looked in the direction of the sound but had zero expectations as i could not imagine what could be making such a noise. as i looked up at about a 50 degree angle from the horizon i noticed a cluster of lights, possibly multicolored in the form of a top hat. the shape was about the size of a quarter at about 125 yards away. the light configuration was that of possibly 3 lights on top a few lights in the center and possibly 5 lights along the "bottom." the lights were sparkling much like a cluster of several bright stars. the sky was lightly cloudy possibly a few wisps of cloud, but none to separate my position and the object. the object descended very slowly about 1 degree every few seconds. my girlfriend was behind me also witnessing the event as i began to yell for my father to come outside. she ran inside to call him and he was outside at exactly 11:15 as he made note of the clock. the object had by that time descended to about 30 degrees or so and was floating about 30 feet above the trees that span approximately 30-50 yards. i apologize for my lack of precise measurement. 

as we stood out there for several minutes watching the object the lights merged and the sound ceased. the several lights solidified into one light about the size of a small marble at the same distance. i was compelled to call my younger bother and told him that i was staring at a ufo. he told me to hang up and record it with a camera phone. i was able to get one picture but i was unfamiliar with the camera and could not successfully film the event. as i was fumbling with the camera i could see through the screen that the light was bouncing and thought that that was due to my shaking hand. however, i was not shaking. my father and girlfriend then began to say that the light was "bouncing" and had possibly turned to our direction because the light intensified. the picture quality was very poor as the camera could not pick up the light at that distance and i was hoping for a video instead of a picture. [the time on the picture is 11:22 pm. i can send the picture to anyone who feels they can decipher anything out of it.] as i put the camera down i noticed a very different behavior from the object that was now a smaller brigher ball of yellowish light. the ball of light moved off into northeaterly direction at an increased speed, but maintained a relatively slow speed. 

my father reported the sighting to the local del rio police non-emergency number. the sound was intermittent throughout the evening at a lower decibel level but i did not see anything else. in the afternoon of march 2 i contacted the local airport to ask if there was any outgoing traffic at between the times of 11 and 11:30 they were curious to ask why i was asking but told me that there may have been, but not that they were aware of. since the lady was of little help. i spoke with the assistant traffic director joel martinez who discussed the event with me and said at his best guess was that of a black hawk helicopter but none were in activity at that time to his knowledge. i discussed with him my unprofessional familiarity with black hawks and we did come to an agreement that this did not match the light configuration. it was at that point that i felt that reassured in the previous idea that what we had witnessed was definitely an unidentified flying object.
content.summary: Top hat shaped cluster of lights accompanied by a deep, loud, resonating hum.

content.detailedDescription: Test
content.summary: Test - delete

content.detailedDescription:
1. we were driving through irvine center drive and all of a sudden a gold flash of light came through the sky.
2. the light first flashed through the sunroof of our 2002 jetta.
3.At first we thought it was a shooting star and then it was too close to our atmosphere for it to be true, and it was too fast and it dissapeared like a light switch went off.
4. the object was a golden disc/boomerang shape and it was fast and zizagged through the sky.
5. we were having quite the chat [ i dont remeber what about ]
 and then a relative suddenly flinched and asked "what was that?" and i looked just in time to see what was happening. and it was a sci-fi feeling like in the middle of a star wars movie. and eery in a way, and a feeling i had never experienced before. and we were quiet for a few minutes afterwards.
6. the sight of the object dissapeared not faded, but just blinked off like boom. and was nowhere in sight like it had been caught and hided.
content.summary: Gold flash of light through the air

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping and having nightmares when i woke up and heard (over earplugs and a noise machine) this high pitched whirring noise (not painful).  i took the earplugs out and turned off the noise machine and realized it was not a noise that anything on earth could make.  i thought i detected a faint green light coming in through the blinds.  i tried to get up but couldn't move, and i felt an unmistakable presense in the house. i felt as if i was being "scanned" for information.  after about ten minutes, the noise began to fade and i was able to move again.  i jumped out of bed to check on my daughter.  she was fine and both she and my husband were asleep and did not hear the noise or wake during the event. nothing else seemed disturbed so i shook my head and went back to bed. 

i never saw any beings or ships during this event but i felt their unmistakable presence.  i had the feeling it had something to do with a book i recently wrote about global warming that will be published this coming summer (the book is directed at middle school students).
content.summary: Strange high-pitched whirring noise at my house

content.detailedDescription: Myself and three other co-workers who worked the night cleaning/lavs crew for united airlines airplanes, were on lunch at o'hare airport.....This was around 02:30 am on a damp, foggy night, it had rained earlier in the night....We were right across the taxiway and hangers for united planes, behind a warehouse called ozark ( the warehouse that provides everything from cleaning to provisioning united airplanes)...We were cooking some steaks on a small weber grill......When we seen it!!!!....About 60-70 feet away and about the same distance in height (right over the taxiway) was this ufo.....I can't recall if it was i, moe,lydia, bill or just all of us but.......Here it came..As we watched it pass by from the right of us, i noticed the odd looking, matallic color ( it had no seams..It shinned, and as it was in front of us, i looked into one of its many lights/windows.....They were real bright, the color was real light yellow....I was hypnotized by the light....And the craziest thing was that it made no sound!!!!!...( if you had your back turned you wouldn't even know that this ufo was there) from what i remember there were about 25- 30 of these lights/windows on the side i could see....It was going approx 12-15 m.P.H if that...As we looked at the ufo pass by we heard aloud rumble in the distance (since we hear so many planes taking off and landing we could id that sound) an airplane taking off down a runway we looked to see the plane coming , quickly it was out of view due to the warehouse and other stuff blocking our sights from the otherside of where we were standing) we looked back  (this is a matter of 2 seconds if that)  at the ufo (which was almost in the path of the live runway) (about to crisscross) we all thought this ufo and plane were going to collide....It was nuts this ufo on the back had these two long looking antennae they were approx 15 feet long ( bill the other witness recalled that they looked as if they were alive!!!), the ufo was about 25-30 feet in width. in that same span the plane got louder, (in two seconds) this ufo had angled upwards and accellerated at such a quick speed it was gone into the clouds and fog.....And then 2 seconds later a united 747 airplane takes off!!!!.....
content.summary: Big, metallic,about 100 feet long,silent,two long antennae on the rear

content.detailedDescription: I was just shooting out the window at my mom's house around 2 a.M. in the morning, there were three red triangular dot things darting around and then there were balls of light bouncing around and sometimes they would get in front of my camera and block my vision and seem to grow.  some were medium and some were smaller.  but when i ran the tape back, this mushroom shaped thing showed up outside mom's window, and it had writing on the top of it i did not understand.  there is no way i could get everything in this note to you that has been happening and is still happening.  our lives have become a nightmare.  i feel like i am living in a movie sometimes and i cannot turn it off.  no one will believe me, because they do not believe in flying saucers.  the story is really that unbelievable that it is hard to believe.  i have 5 cassettes so far and i plan on taking more.  they know i am out to get them, i haven't made any secret of it, so they are not afraid of me.  when anyone else shows up, there is not a sign or a sound.  but, pictures do not lie.  the only problem is.....My digital camera, for some strange reason, will not download to the computer.  it is hooked up correctly, but it will not download.  and when i run the cassettes to check them, things on the cassettes will disappear in front of my eyes.  so, i am just going to put what i have in envelopes and seal them.  i will get them to you in any way possible, but i do not trust these things.  i have seen people like us, hairy ape looking people, animals, see what i mean.  there have always been two men in charge as far as i have been able to film.  an older man with white hair, full white beard and mustache and a younger man with reddish brown hair, neatly trimmed mustache and beard.  please help me.  my mothers health has suffered terribly with this, and my nerves are just about shot.  you feel like you are alone in the world.  i appreciate any help you can give us.  thank you very much.  lori gates
content.summary: I was taping three triangular dot things  and some small and medium size balls of light floating around when i picked this up on the film.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on i-40 perhaps an hr. west of the n.M/az border....I had stopped to take photgraphs of the sunrise......The image attached was shot from a knoll on the side of i-40. at the time of the shoot i did not see anything, although the night before had sighted something several times just west of albequerque n.M. the image became apparent during post processing when i enlarged the frame to a 100% of its value.....I do not know what it is....I have had four sightings in my life time, this would be 5 and the first recorded image if indeed it is an et craft.
my feelings about the subject are enthusiastic, i believe whole-heartedly that we are not alone, though i have only speculation as to the interest of these craft and et's........As i said the night before this occurance, 
i watched a bright object-very illuminated over the traffic just outside albequerque n.M.....It eventuall slid away and 10 minuets later ...Popped!
dierctly in front and above me perhaps 3-4000 feet; the light was phenomenal and the shape somewhat star-like......I drove under the object and continued on my way without incident.
content.summary: Verticle light in distance

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside to empty trash on the n, nw, side of the house. with a clear night, partial moonlight and stars, i noticed a glowing object moving slowly across the sky in a s, se direction. i first noticed it when it was about 4-5 miles away. it was not at a high elevation, i would estimate between 4-6000 feet. i think i expected to see some kind of aircraft lighting appear, but none appeared.

i observe aircraft from this location, notably, mid-size commercial airliners on their approach into john wayne airport, some 16-18 miles north, and a local sheriff's patrol helicopter. i am aware of what flies in my area. 

this was not an aircraft. it had no navigation lights or other lights. it was too low to be picking up sunlight but too high for me to get a clear, detailed view. it was mostly sperical and had a dark orange color that appeared to emanate from some thing inside it. the logic of this caught my attention. how come i could see something that is not reflecting sunlight in a very dark night sky and is not an aircraft as we know them? and what gives it this dull dark orange color?

i ran back into the house and grabbed some binoculars and was able to find the object again and focus on it. it appeared the same as with the naked eye, however, i was able to notice the tumbling a bit more and also the appearance of it slowing expanding, contracting or metamorphing into different, yet still sperical shapes as it traveled. it was gainig altitude at the same rate that it traveled across the sky.

i was very surprised to see something so unusual. i have seen the, shuttle, the iss and many other satelites cross the night sky, but this was not in an apparent orbit and it was nit the typical silver or white in appearance. this happened two days ago and i'm still flabbergasted as to what it was.

i lost sight of it as it got higher and higner and moved into the moonlight at which point the light affected my eye too much to find it or even see it again.

what was it?

thanks-
content.summary: Witnessed a tumbling burnt orange sphere moving s, se, across night sky.

content.detailedDescription: This is the second time this week i have witnessed this odd light from my back porch.. the odd thing is it comes and goes. is in relatively the same position yet then will disapear. on tuesday feb. 27 my son and i witnessed this. i knew it was not an ordinary star, planet or air craft. it was just hovering. when my son saw the light he went to get his telescope. as he began to sight it in the light- i kid you not - seemed to become thin and as if it were changing into two parts. then i told my son to get in. i did not want to see any more since it was so profound!!!!!  when my husband returned home from work late at 12:45 the light reappeared.. it was not visible shortly after the first sighting at 7:30, once we heard planes in the sky we looked and it was gone. when my husband saw it he too thought it was unusual. he went in to get his scope. the light seemed to flicker and when he did get it in his sight we could see beautiful colors of red green yellow pulsating from this. it was like nothing i can explain! after we returned in the house and spoke of this  a while i told him i betr it was once again gone- surre enoughit was! i will be looking tonight. i will have camera in hand!  please note we are in rural kentucky and there was no sound. you can hear a train for five miles! definately an odd sight!
content.summary: Fire ball emiting colors of red green and flashing

content.detailedDescription: It was so werid it was scaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaary dont hurt me
content.shape: Boomerang,  Chevron,  Fireball,  Flash,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Wow

content.detailedDescription: I dont even know it happend so fast and the i black ed out but when i woke up there was sothing standing next to me i was like 12ft. tall and then i fainted again and when i woke for the second time i was on a hill an i saw the craft leaving
content.summary: It was very remarkable and completely terrifying at the same time

content.detailedDescription:
This object is not flying. i am not a crazy person and i have reported this to environment canada and st. mary's university.  both say they do not know what it is but agree it is not a planet or star.
it is stationary and moves with the turning of the earth.  i observe it the south eastern sky.  with my binoculars i see it as flashing red, white and green.  this would make you think that it is a plane and we do see many planes and helicopters in the sky at any given time but i have been observing this for over a month and it is in the same place every night that the sky is clear.  i think it is some kind of a security satalite or something as it cannot be the space station or an orbiting
satalite.  it is really an unidentified object not something from space but it is in space.  i just would like to know what it is. to the naked eye is just looks like a very bright star (brighter than venus) but when you look at it through binoculars it looks like a cross.  again i am truthfully telling you that i am not crazy or on drugs or drunk.  i am a normal retired person who sees something in the sky.  my husband also has observed this object and sees the same as i do.  so that's my story and as the song says "and i'm stickin' to it."  i cannot send you a picture of it as my camera would not pick it up but it is in the sky every night and it is not going away.

thank-you very much
joan
content.summary: Flashing light

content.detailedDescription: I was tacking trash out to the dumpster when i looked up and saw a row of lights red orange and white, and some lights were pulsing. the object was directly north from my position (thomas guide page 562 g5) and during my observation two planes landing at burbank crossed west to east. the object did not move for several minutes eventually it slowly became smaller and rose somewhat in the sky. i watched it for about 5 minutes, no sound, eventually it became very small and i could no longer see it.
content.summary: A row of four or more lights red orange and white pulsing

content.detailedDescription: at approx 8:10pm me and 3 coworkers watched a green orb pulsed high in the sky and then drift away before dropping down vertically and hiding behind a hill. i gave my binocs to a coworker and she described the same thing. it did the same movements and hid behind the same hill last friday,1/23. me and the security guard watched it together that night and he agreed that it wasnt a star nor plane and we watched it move off and away before dipping down behind a hill. i 1st saw it last thursday eve around 8pm and it pulsed strongly and dimmed down as a plane approached low under it and then it resumed the same size and shape. i watched it for 10-15 minutes before it pulsed and then blinkied out. i'm having headaches, loss of appetite, strong thirst (especially orange juice-i could live off of it alone. but i feel very, very good and at peace. i also have a very strong hyper-awareness and clear headedness. i feel the time is now and i'm ready. i have goosebumps constatntly and feel as though i'm going to bust out of my skin like a butterfly emerging from a chrysillis. at the risk of sounding delusional, i feel very special. saw it late last night after midnight (12:20am~)very high up and noticed it eject a red orb and saw a light streak under it..Looked like an orb through my binocs. get ready and god has blessed us all.
content.summary: Cones and orbs

content.detailedDescription:
This is preliminary report data provided to mufon - wisconsin.  an investigation has been initiated.

it started by 15th street (greater kenosha, wisconsin) and appeared to follow me to highway "e" and went west with me until i hit highway 31 and turned north.  it took off at that point and headed southeast.  it was approximately 1,000 to 2,000 feet above the ground.  there were some clouds, but it was well below them.  it appeared round until i turned and saw it was more oblong in shape.  it gave off more of an off-white color.  when i watched it leave in my car's mirror, it left a streak of light like you might see in a star trek or star wars movie, but made no sound whatsoever as i had opened my window to try and hear something.  in a previouis ufo sighting when i was a kid, the ufo did create a sonic boom several times over when it left our area, but nothing this time.

(additional data will be added as the investigation progresses)
content.summary: Ufo followed witness' car, turned to follow when witness turned.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i had been hunting near seymour tx. as we were leaving, an hour or so after dark, he noticed a flashing (blinking) light in the sky. we were approximately 20 miles west of seymour and the lights were slightly south and west of us. the lights had a steady, repeating pattern of about 1/2 second on then 1/2 second off. this pattern repeated for as long as we watched the lights.

the lights were at a very high altitude, and was a pattern or grid of lights. it looked like a bank of lights from a football stadium. we watched for several minutes and the lights did not move. i am ex-air force and work in the aircraft industry and have never seen anything so large at such a high altitude.

i was able to take a video of the lights with my digital camera. the first attachment was at no zoom, the second at 12x zoom.

the lights were still there when we left the area.
content.summary: Steady flashing pattern of lights in the sky near seymour texas

content.detailedDescription:
Here in northwest bend, oregon, my husband, neighbor, and i walked next door, to another neighbor's house tonight, right around 6:05pm pst (civilian time).  i know because a tv show that we tivo'ed began just as we were walking out the front door.  we were in the next door neighbor's house for probably about ten minutes. 

when the three of us left the next door neighbor's house, we walked outside, and around to the west side of the nextdoor neighbor's house.  as we did, i looked into the night sky because it was a pretty night.  it was mostly clear (i could see one or two early stars (i.E. bright ones - perhaps venus or saturn?)), there were one or two light clouds (it was snowing very sparsely), and it was not a dark or darkening sky, yet.  the sun was just starting to set.  in other words, the sky was still 80%, or so, day lit.  immediately i noticed a very bright gold consitent light (it didn't blink or alternate with another color).  it appeared to be very high in the sky.  it moved in a straight line, towards the southeast from the west (past the moon), quickly.  i describe "quickly", here as moving faster than i've ever seen a jet fly (including the high altitude flights one can see sometimes by the jet fuel trail); but the speed was not a streak or comet-like.  the speed was speedy and consistent.  there was no sound whatsoever.  there was no blinking tail or wing lights.  there was no blinking, there was no other light, the light shone at the same hue and brilliance the entire time i saw the object.  when i realized that i heard nothing and that it was one singular continuous light i thought 'what is that?  it can't be an airplane as there are not safety lights and it's silent'.  it was an extremely bright light for the altitude that it must have been at.  in other words, this was not a satellite - it was too early to be able to see one, this light was much brighter and larger than satilites, and it moved quicker than satellites (which do move quickly when seen in the dark night sky, and they're smaller lights than this one was).  in about 30 or 40 seconds, or so, it had crossed most of the entire sky (the whole expanse of the sky that we could see).  there was nothing else moving/flying in the sky.

i watched it cross the sky.  by the time that we were walking into our front door (just next door, mind you) it was out of the field of vision of our view, of the whole sky.  in other words, it was gone.

i asked my husband to look at it a few seconds after i noticed it.  he saw it.  later, when he and i were alone back in our house, i asked him what he thought.  he agrees with me that it was not a satelite as it was too bright a light to be a satellite and it was too early in the evening (given the daylight) to be able to see satellites.  he said that he didn't know what it was.  he thinks it could've been a high altitude flight.  when i remind him that there wasn't any noise he admits he can't explain why a high altitude flight would not be heard (even they have a very audible bass sound).  i reminded him that "ufo" is "unidentified flying object".  he admitted he doesn't know what it was, but he has a difficult time saying it was definitely a ufo.

sadly, i did not get a a photo or recording (there was no sound to record) of it.  if i were to sketch what i saw, it would appear to be a larger star moving silently and quickly in a straight line across an 80% still daylit sky.
content.summary: Silent bright solid light crosses sky in straight trajectory eastward quickly.

content.detailedDescription: I walked my girlfriend to her car around 9:40 pm and looked up and saw what i thought at first was 2 lines of flying geese, one behind the other. i realized that it was moving too fast to be geese even though the lights seemed to be above cloud level. there were several waves of these strings of lights, some brighter than others. traveling perpendicular to the direction of the clouds' movement and visible through the clouds. my girlfriend also witnessed this. the event lasted about 10 min. each line of lights disappeared after about 10 seconds as it flew northward and was drowned out by the lights of springfield. i called the springfield police to see if stange lights had been reported flying over springfield, and the officer checked with the dispatcher and told me there had been no other reports of lights. i gave the officer a brief description of what i saw and she told me to call back if i saw anything else.
content.summary: Several long strings of dull lights, like flying wings.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down an alley and the ufo stoped over us and the car just stopped and a wierd figure got out and lookedat us then the alien dissapearedthen the ufo was gone.
content.summary: Flat ,green lights on the side,and a bubble on top

content.detailedDescription:
During camping with my brothers, we were lying on our backs stargazing, when i noticed a star, slightly pulsating, just visibly. it seemed to be a redder colour than the other stars, and as i continued watching, it moved, suddenly, sharply, changing course to a greater distance, then stopping. 

i exclaimed to my brothers and i pointed to the star. it moved again and was followed by a green coloured star, which just seemed to appear to its left. after a few seconds, the movements started again and it almost looked like they were playing with other; a game across the sky. we watched, literally amazed at what we were witnessing. 

before our eyes, another came into the scene, it was yellow and acted like the other two stars, criss-crossing each other in trio for around fifteen minutes. we couldnt tell anything about the lights, any shape other than what looked like flying, coloured stars. they dissapeared from our view and flew off, in different directions at very high speed.
content.summary: Three starlike objects, were witnessed high in the night sky by myself and two brothers. they began to move quickly and in differing directions.

content.detailedDescription: I was in a car on the front seat it was about 4 and i looked up to the sky and saw a small tiny metalic sphere i thought it was an add ballon but it was way to high up even for a weather ballon it was a clear cloudless day and it slowly hoverd south east and then slowly dissolved in to nothing.
content.summary: It was small metalic hovering in the sky

###########################################################################

hello,
[~17:19]
i was at my window of my house and looked out of my window.
it rained, but it was a realy special rain-day, because the clouds and the lighting conditions are very nice / butefull. so i want to make a picture out of my window with my mobile phone.

[~17:00] 
befor,
i was in my house and making some pictures in the house. but my handy doesnt save the pictures dont know why. but i think that not realy have to do with a ufo or something.

[~17:18]
after, i see a round little point (little because the mobile phone screen isnt big) wich looks like a silver or gray, from older times, like from the 1960s or older or somthing (if you know the story about german world war 2 ufos, like this color http://www.Nrg.Co.Il/images/archive/408x322/577/086.Jpg). the object not realy shone (not "bling bling"). 

i see the object only with my handy camera. i cant see it with my eye (i readet about the phenomen).
i was shot a picture but my handy doesnt save it, dont know why but i think that not realy have to do with a ufo or something.

[~17:20]
restartet my mobile phone. with some startup problems because the start button sucks or something.

[17:23]
shot the first picture.
dsc00371.Jpg

[17:23]
shot the second picture.
dsc00372.Jpg
the "ufo" were littler, think it "fly" away (think the sky were a lil bit darker <- my sun reflaction therory)

[17:23]
shot the last picture.
dsc00373.Jpg



all in one, the "ufo" dont moved higher / lower. i dont heard what from the "ufo". it was a "fix" point in the sky.

i dont think that that is a ufo, i think thats a sun-reflection to my handy camera. so, whats strange if you look at the first picture you see a "star" or sun-"star"-reflection. mayby a alien moves arround or something :) or  engine "smoke" or "rader scanner" or something.

i say again, i dont think that that a ufo is, i want send you the pictures because i think thats just a sun-reflaction and i want help u to filter out fakes or those sight phenomens.
i have the orginal fotos on my mobile-phone (no worry about fakes or something :)).

if you have questions about the "signt" or some geographic things, just ask me, i like storys about ufos, aliens, stuff like this. i hope i helped you all, and sorry for my bad english.



please contact me want to know what you think about,
pascal g.

content.summary: Ufo i the sun

content.detailedDescription: I was on the triple chair lift at maple ski ridge alone and i see a light crusing along at a normal plane speed in the distance to my left. then it, without even stopping,changes course to down and back, diagonally, much faster (unlike a chopper.) when it is near the tree line it stopped and hovered, then gradually sank below the trees. later on my next lift ride i saw it apparently rise up again and fly away.
content.summary: Wierd light
